name: My Plus One
description:
Created by Tori Blas, Rosie Carriker Smothers, and Miranda Gutierrez for English 328: Writing for Video Games.

Tori Blas was in charge of coding as well as Ronnie's storyline.  Rosie Carriker Smothers wrote Brick's storyline, and Miranda wrote River's story. We hope that whoever ends up on this page enjoys our hard work!

Credits

Game created with Ren'Py

Characters Created on Charat Petit 2

Music obtained from https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Some pictures found on:

https://www.pexels.com/
